documents.document: @BATMANONFILM @neilturitz Now I'm even more bummed.
@jonmachota What they've done in the salary cap era is amazing. They win with guys who probably couldn't start elsewhere.
@NFLCharean Not for Falcons and Patriots fans.
@SportsSturm Where's "Major Boobage?" Where's "The Coon Trilogy?" Where's "The Mystery of the Urinal Deuce?" 🤣🤣🤣
@BATMANONFILM Yep. Small comfort for those guys who emptied their buckets onto the field Sunday and still saw their season end.
@JoeyIckes @mlombardiNFL I don't know whether to laugh or cry. I'm just speechless.
@mlombardiNFL @BATMANONFILM You see this yet, Jett? 😯😠😖😫😫😫😵
@JoeyIckes 🤔okay now why did I think he was in TB before AZ? Man you turn 40 and your mind just goes.
@JC1053 Great season but a shame to waste such a golden opportunity with home field advantage.
@CHQ_Jordan I'm sure that's what Dan Marino thought in 1984 and Tony Romo thought in 2007.
@Birddog26 @SonnyKoufax10 @PaulThrows Attemped piggy back?
@Birddog26 @SonnyKoufax10 @PaulThrows If what Doug Free did was holding, what the hell do you call that?
@HelmanDC Home field advantage is rare. Can't afford to blow a great chance for the Super Bowl. Might not ever get back.
@BryanBroaddus It's because we all want to know your take on things. 😀
@CowboysNation1 This X1,000
@CaptainFrugal Lately I'm itching to replay Castlevania: Symphony of the Night.
@CaptainFrugal I love Halo. Some of the games are masterpieces and others are meh. But I love the whole franchise.
@CaptainFrugal Me either. I've always thought it looked cartoonish. I stuck with Halo and COD.
@TxTechGooner @SportsSturm @LifeTexas I've got iHeartRadio and could get tunein. I might give it a listen or visit some NYG message boards.
@SportsSturm @LifeTexas After the wringer Romo was put thru in 2007 I'd love to hear those fans rip OBJ and his Miami crew.
@SportsSturm @LifeTexas Wouldn't you love to listen to New York sports talk radio for next few weeks?
@CowboysNation1 How was that not holding or PI on Sensabaugh on the TD?
@makecomicsgreat @starwars Just made no sense. There was no heroic purpose or honor in it. Just "Whatevs. I'll just die here."
@makecomicsgreat @starwars I wondered why he just said, "Screw it. I'll just die here." Made no sense.
@Timothy_Barrett Lol. I can't figure it out. Seahawks are a dirty team but refs were much harder on the Lions last night.
@Timothy_Barrett Fair is fair. Lions got hosed.
@geofbar Unbelievable that pass interference was not called.
@jacksonclyde27 @makecomicsgreat @Lauren_Southern Suuposed to be @AnnCoulter I'd guess.
@makecomicsgreat Marvel: I don't get it! Why are sales tanking? I guess we aren't putting out enough socially conscious books!
@CowboysNation1 Oh i was just talking about ice cream. I'd rather rewatch the 2007 playoff game against the Giants than any ESPN show.
@CowboysNation1 Asparagus for me, please. 😜
@doyle_pj @BryanBroaddus @robphillips3 I might sneak in a little HALO late on an occasional Friday night but work and family makes it hard.
@doyle_pj @BryanBroaddus @robphillips3 My stepson plays. I haven't played Madden in 14 years or so. Too many responsibilities now. 🙁
@TjRuLz6298 @BryanBroaddus @robphillips3 🙄 And some think that could happen for reals. Mostly listeners who call sports talk radio shows.
@BryanBroaddus @robphillips3 It's just my theory, Mr. B. Hate to just think they're a bunch of dummies who know nothing about the NFL.🙂
@BryanBroaddus @robphillips3 The Madden games give lots of people bad expectations for NFL trades.
#ShaunKingSoWhite He thinks MC Hammer's music was too hardcore.
#ShaunKingSoWhite He's been parasailing.
#ShaunKingSoWhite His favorite band is The Moody Blues.
#ShaunKingSoWhite He tips his servers at restaurants.
#ShaunKingSoWhite He orders his steaks rarer than well done.
#ShaunKingSoWhite He thinks those Tyler Perry Madea movies are pretty good.
#ShaunKingSoWhite He's seen every episode of Friends but never watched Living Single.
#ShaunKingSoWhite He thinks Wayne Brady needs to dial it back a bit.
#ShaunKingSoWhite His drivers license has never been suspended.
#ShaunKingSoWhite He unironically rocked a mullet in grade school. (Not a joke. This actually happened. Google it.)
#ShaunKingSoWhite He's never been fingerprinted.
#ShaunKingSoWhite If he gets cut, he bleeds milk.
#ShaunKingSoWhite He had to score at least a 28 on his ACT to get into a decent college.
#ShaunKingSoWhite He actually knows how to swim.
@getongab Awesome! But I'm still waiting on my invite... Been like a month...
@Gil_Brandt @Tony_Dorsett My dad made me go to bed before this play...😫😩😫
@RayderMan @thisisalexreyes @Eric_Edholm @JC1053 His statement is accurate But I think he's delusional for thinking he knows what he's doing
@thisisalexreyes @Eric_Edholm @JC1053 York's statement is some Jerry Jones circa 1996 level of self delusion.
@thisisalexreyes @Eric_Edholm @JC1053 Trying is good but I couldn't forgive him allowing Baalke to run off Jim Harbaugh if I were a 49er fan
@Eric_Edholm @JC1053 That noise you hear is cheering from Los Angeles, Seattle and Arizona and laughing from the rest of the NFC.
@rjochoa @richeisen I just remember it still being daylight when the game ended. Man, we were so close to going to the NFC Title Game.
@rjochoa @richeisen I think we were the early game that day in Green Bay, RJ.
@JC1053 @SInow @thefootballgirl I knew the 49ers were dysfunctional when they fired Harbaugh for the flimsiest of reasons.
@rjochoa Glad we won't see them in the playoffs.
@rjochoa @Tixpunched I think it's pretty good. It was a dream job for a 16 year old Cowboy fan. A magical time.
@JC1053 Glad we won't see the Skins in the playoffs.
@rjochoa @Tixpunched I worked at a football/baseball cards and comics shop in high school from 92 to 94. Collected a bunch of stuff.
@1970Bing @SportsSturm I fear the Redskins more than the Giants this year but don't relish playing either of them.
@rjochoa @Tixpunched I still have that issue of Beckett's somewhere.
@JC1053 @drewdavison In other words we can forget about seeing Gregory in the playoffs or in 2017.
@rjochoa Let's hope for a different result with Daks team
@JC1053 Because they're the Browns.
@BryanBroaddus Don't call timeout. Just let it run and get out of town. SMH
@AdamSchefter Randall Williams for the Cowboys against the Ragles in 2003.
@JoeyIckes @CHQ_Jordan I'm sure now the league will take notice and suspend him for the playoffs and all of 2017.
@YumaCactus Graham hit him in the face while swiping at the ball earlier. No call.
@JC1053 Except when I'm playing for the fantasy championship last week and he produced nothing.
@Atlanta962 This X1,000,000
@CowboysNation1 Hopefully Jaylon Smith.
@EltdPodcast I'd follow.
@inoxum1 @CowboysNation1 That game pretty well ruined Pozderac's career I remember we started 6-2 and finished 7-9 after Whites injury in NY
@p0is0n0uz @CHQ_Jordan Could be taken that way I suppose. Dang it...
@CHQ_Jordan It's insulting to the NFL that he's won 2 Super Bowls with teams that were not even close to being the best in the league.
@RichardBSpencer The Melting of the Snowflakes
@makecomicsgreat @DailyMail What a tolerant little fascist asshole to berate a woman and her family over politics.
@makecomicsgreat I've been watching from the 1st ep. It's pretty good. It's been a little PC at times but not too terribly annoying.
@Tarheel_Paul Very telling what Troy thought of Jerry the GM. "But Jerry wasn't having any fun with Jimmy Johnson coaching!!!" Lol!
@getongab Hello, I've been on the waiting list for a few weeks. Any ETA on getting the invite after applying? Thanks!
Happy Birthday, @BryanBroaddus !! You are the man!
@SportsSturm @patthinx But Jerry loves him.
@SportsSturm This! This! This! X1,000,000,000!
@rjochoa This! X1,000,000,000
@jonmachota He might need to start warming up.
Offense is wasting a great game by this undermanned defense.
Now would be a good time for Dak to start playing well.
@rjochoa Dunbar takes your biggest weapon off the field. I don't care how much Jerry Jones likes him.
Cowboys can't do a damn thing without holding but apparently the giants o-line never does.
@CowboysNation1 Wishbi could favorite that X1,000,000.
@BEBolly71 @jrstuit @RapSheet Save some for me. Got any hot sauce to go with it?
@Edwerderespn @JasonRomano I've thought exactly that for 20 years, Mr. Werder. Totally agree with you.
@rabblerousr @JC1053 I think Marinelli would curse...
@NFLCharean Dumb players do dumb things.
@makecomicsgreat @vox_independens Didn't Jackman audition for Bond but lost out to Craig? IIRC producers said Jackman's audition was too fey
@Dixonverse That's only because your a conservative, Chuck. It wouldn't say that to Dan Slott.
